rukus.text: When the angels seize the souls of those who have wronged themselves—scolding them, “What do you think you were doing?” they will reply, “We were oppressed in the land.” The angels will respond, “Was God’s earth not spacious enough for you to emigrate?” It is they who will have Hell as their home—what an evil destination
Except helpless men, women, and children who cannot afford a way out—
it is right to hope that God will pardon them. For God is Ever-Pardoning, All-Forgiving

Whoever emigrates in the cause of God will find many safe havens and bountiful resources throughout the earth. Those who leave their homes and die while emigrating to God and His Messenger—their reward has already been secured with God. And God is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful
